title: Iron Man
description: Tony Stark, a wealthy industrialist, builds a suit of armor to escape captivity and becomes Iron Man.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes assemble to stop Loki and his alien army from invading Earth.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa returns home to Wakanda to take the throne as king but faces challenges from rivals.

title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
description: Peter Parker goes on a school trip to Europe and faces new threats as Spider-Man.

title: Eternals
description: A group of immortal beings with superhuman powers must come together to protect humanity.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor embarks on a journey of self-discovery, facing new challenges and old enemies.

title: The Marvels
description: Captain Marvel, Ms. Marvel, and Monica Rambeau team up to save the universe.
